attributes.action: Stop election lies and bring professional politics to the forefront
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All political parties should campaign on the basis of policy and equality. Parties must end party-benefiting lying and media frenzying in order for the people of Britain to choose who can benefit them most.

Britain is in a dire state, therefor this election must be right by the people. Parties who lie OR make allegations, such as the PM bullying, should face democratic monetary sanctions in terms of donations to their groups unless they stick by fact, evidence and POLICY, which will benefit the people of Britain.

We can't go on trusting what media bias says - we need transparent and democratic action, not media savvy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the appropriate political parties.
